scripts.build:xpi: npm run build && web-ext build --source-dir=extension --artifacts-dir=build --overwrite-dest && powershell -Command "Copy-Item 'build\auto_youtube_shorts_scroller-3.1.3.zip' 'build\auto-youtube-shorts-scroller.xpi' -Force"
scripts.build:zip: npm run build && powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path build | Out-Null; Compress-Archive -Path 'extension\*' -DestinationPath 'build\auto-youtube-shorts-scroller.zip' -Force"
